title: CDR + champ utility
body:
Never really thought too much about CDR - always aimed for big crit builds or full tank (depending on champ)

http://i.imgur.com/hWIZHzO.gifv

replies.body: I've seen this on ahri lately... not fun to vs :')

> [{quoted}](name=Hide Yo Wives,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Z5U5iKoE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-06T11:28:49.995+0000)
>
> I've seen this on ahri lately... not fun to vs :')

I'd always gone for magic pen boots but now depending on items I usually go cooldown.
